title: DMRC Recruitment 2017 General Manager (Electrical)

organizations.name: traction work/ rolling stock in indian railways/ metro

text:
Age Limit (as on 01/01/2017): 
(a) Direct Recruitment for serving Candidates - Between 55 years to 58 years (b) Re-employment Basis for Superannuated Candidates - Between 58 years to 62 years 
Pay Scale (IDA): 
(a) Direct Recruitment for serving Candidates - ₹ 5130-73000/- (b) Re-employment Basis for Superannuated Candidates - Consolidated Fees of ₹ 1,10,300/- 
Place of Posting : Delhi / NCR 
Eligibility: 
(A) On Direct Recruitment Basis -> Officers of Railways in CDA pay scale of Rs.37400-67000 (Grade pay Rs. 10000) with a total of 23 years service at Gazetted/Executive level in any Govt. Organization or PSU including services put in on deputation in the above pay scale. (OR) Officers of Railways in CDA pay scale of Rs.37400-67000 (Grade pay Rs.8700) with a total of 23 years service at Gazetted/Executive level in any Govt. Organization or PSU and 8 years services at selection grade (Rs.37400-67000 (Grade pay Rs.8700) ) including services put in on deputation in the above pay scale. (B) On Re-employment Basis -> For employees retired from Railways/ Railway PSU's/ Metro in CDA pay scales. Retired Officers of Railways/Railway PSU's/Metro in CDA pay scale of Rs.37400-67000 (Grade pay Rs.10000) with a total of 23 years service at Gazetted/ Executive level in any Govt. Organization or PSU including services put in on deputation in the above pay scale. 
Work Experience: The candidate should have a proven multi disciplinary experience profile in Railway works. The candidate should have experience of Traction Work/ Rolling Stock in Indian Railways/ Metro. 
Selection Process : Shortlisted candidates will be called for Group Discussion and Interview, Medical Examination. 
How to Apply: Eligible and interested candidates apply in the prescribed application format. The candidate must enclose all relevant proof / documents in support of qualification, experience & pay scale/ gross salary. Completed applications should be addressed to General Manager (HR), Delhi Metro Rail Corporation Ltd, Metro Bhawan Fire Brigade Lane, Barakhamba Road, New Delhi by Speed Pst on or before 13/02/2017 . The postal cover envelope super scribing on the cover prominently - Name of Post.
